item.title: Let us serve you, but don't bring us down
item.description: - Archive.org experienced an hour-long outage due to tens of thousands of requests per second launched from 64 virtual hosts on Amazon Web Services, which brought the site down for all users.

item.title: India ruling party's IT cell used AI to show smile on arrested protesters' faces
item.description: - Some of India's top wrestlers were detained by Delhi Police after demanding the arrest of the WFI president and BJP MP Brij Bhushan Sharan Singh over allegations of sexual harassment.

item.title: HBO Max new Captcha system
item.description: - This text does not contain any meaningful content to summarize.

item.title: 300ms Faster: Reducing Wikipedia's total blocking time
item.description: - Total Blocking Time (TBT) measures the sum of all long tasks on a browser's main thread that blocks user interaction between First Contentful Paint and Time to Interactive.

item.title: Setris – Tetris with Sand Physics
item.description: - 'Setris' is a new game that combines the mechanics of Tetris with sand physics.

item.title: An open-source alternative to QuickBooks
item.description: - This website is best experienced by visiting the website directly.

item.title: Wikipedia had wrong Vatican flag for years – now incorrect flags are everywhere
item.description: - The Vatican flag, featuring a yellow and white background and a papal coat of arms, is often displayed by Catholics around the world as a symbol of their identity.

item.title: Donut: OCR-Free Document Understanding Transformer
item.description: - Donut is an OCR-free document understanding transformer that achieves state-of-the-art performance on visual document understanding tasks without off-the-shelf OCR engines or APIs.

item.title: Removing support for forwarded ports
item.description: - This text appears to be the header of a website, likely belonging to Mullvad VPN.

item.title: Production AI systems are hard
item.description: - Radiologists have a complex job that requires a 3D world model of the brain and its dynamics, making it nearly impossible to replace them entirely with AI systems.
